summary: Bikini\'s, what more do you need to know? XD
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://shrani.si/f/2j/11g/4fPOB5qr/description.png[/img]

I made this bikini\'s for myself at first when i got them from [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=489563]cotyounoyume[/url] from his mod [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5564]a little sexy apparel replacer - for CBBE -[/url], but then i made more re-textures and also a topless version so i made it all into 1 mod and with his permission i can share it with all of you now =)

Theres 12 Bikini version\'s & each one has normal & topless version (Chainmail is normal only) in this mod, listed below:

Original White by [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=489563]cotyounoyume[/url]
Floral Black
Floral Blue
Floral Green
Floral Red
Pink
Black
Stars
Leather
Leopard
White Tiger
Chainmail
White - Topless
Floral Black - Topless
Floral Blue - Topless
Floral Green - Topless
Floral Red - Topless
Pink - Topless
Black - Topless
Stars - Topless
Leather - Topless
Leopard - Topless
White Tiger - Topless

compitable with CBBE like originals by cotyounoyume. (if you use some other body mods and textures different to CBBE you might have some nipple problems being out of place etc..)

Original file: [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5564]a little sexy apparel replacer - for CBBE -[/url]

[img]http://shrani.si/f/2M/Cm/4S4UjNcX/additional-info.png[/img]

Stand-alone? Yes.
Craftable? Yes. (Under MISC category, they\'re by name\'s listed above)
Upgradeable? Yes. (Kinda usless as it\'s cloth without any armor stats :D)

Mats needed for crafting (it\'s the same for every version):

3 Leather Strips
4 Leather

Upgrading/improving (as above it\'s usless it\'s just a cloth :P):

1 Leather Strip
1 Leather

Chainmail version has stat\'s of Leather armor (Light Armor) and only chainmail, the rest are without.

[color=#00BFFF][size=5]Strapless Bra Bikini\'s (More skimpy panties and strapless top)[/size][/color]

Strapless Bikini - Hot
Strapless Bikini - WhiteBlue
Strapless Bikini - Black
Strapless Bikini - Chainmail
Strapless Bikini - Snow Leopard

=================================
Can be purchased in:

Whiterun - Elrindir (Drunken Huntsman)
=================================

This ones are now Light Armor and have basic def of leather armor.

Stand-alone? Yes.
Craftable? Yes. (Under MISC category, they\'re by name\'s listed above)
Upgradeable? Yes.
Compitable with Bikini Clothes? Yes.

Mats needed for crafting:

3 Leather Strips
4 Leather

Upgrading/improving:

1 Leather



If you like to get them by cheating (using console) then type in console \"help bikini 4\" without \"\"

[img]http://shrani.si/f/N/vw/32QOhOln/installation.png[/img]

Manual: Extract RAR file & put textures, meshes folders & .esp file inside your Skyrim/Data folder & activate ESP file.
Downloading via NMM: First i suggest to delete any previous manual installation\'s then just install with NMM and activate ESP file.

[img]http://shrani.si/f/16/qb/2qzSueGD/uninstalling.png[/img]

Delete files.
NMM: Go to \"Mods\" select the mod and click icon(blue folder with red arrow) on the left, that will deactivate and delete installed files.

[img]http://shrani.si/f/1z/UD/4MycJeJH/update-log.png[/img]

1.2v Update - Added Leopard, White Tiger & Chainmail version.
1.2v - Added 4 new colors (Leather, Black, Floral Black & Stars)
1.1v - Added Topless for all colors + normal pink version

Strapless Bra Bikini\'s:

1.1v - Chainmail & Snow Leopard added.
1.0v - New bikini\'s with 3 different colors.
 
[img]http://shrani.si/f/2s/mz/1v3GZxUG/credits.png[/img]

[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=489563]cotyounoyume[/url] - Author of original underwear files
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=259193]SydneyB[/url] - Box models
author: Snezko and Cotyounoyume
